title: Eternal Winter Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to roleblock a random player who would attack a player of your choice tonight.
- Use 2 bees to redirect all visits from one player to another tonight.
**Hyperborean Hornets** â€” Use 3 bees to choose up to two players. If no players chosen this way are visited by two or more non-Everfrost players, roleblock all players chosen this way, then coldsnap.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
- Whenever a player is roleblocked by anything, you gain 0.25 bees.

desc:
Post 2747
*Encased in bzzzz, your expression will be preserved forever.*
Roleblock immune
